title: Chapter V - Public Access To Records
content:
Chapter V - Public Access To Records

State Regulations

Part 2370 - Public Access To The Records Of The Department Of Taxation And Finance And The State Tax Commission (ยง 2370.1 to 2370.10)

Part 2371 - Access To And Correction Or Amendment Of Records Of The Department Of Taxation And Finance And The State Tax Commission Subject To The Personal Privacy Protection Law (ยง 2371.1 to 2371.11)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
